metadata.title: CVE-2023-52429 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: dm_table_create in drivers/md/dm-table.c in the Linux kernel through 6.7.4can attempt to (in alloc_targets) allocate more than INT_MAX bytes, andcrash, because of a missing check for struct dm_ioctl.target_count.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
